name: Spectral Archer
flavor: A ghostly fighter with an ethereal bow, unable to move on while their charge is vulnerable.

features.name: Ghost - Passive
features.desc: The Archer has resistance to physical damage. Mark a Stress to move up to Close range through solid objects.

features.name: Pick Your Target - Action
features.desc: Spend a Fear to make an attack against a target within Very Close range of at least two other PCs. On a success, the target takes 2d8+12 physical damage.
